p: All experiments were repeated 3 times in parallel, and the data were expressed as mean ± standard deviation. Data were analyzed by SPSS 16.0 software (SPSS Inc., Chicago, USA) and GraphPad Prism 5 (Prism, GraphPad Software, San Diego, CA). Differences between groups were analyzed by t test. P < 0.05 was considered to be statistically significant.
